card.name: Sanctum Reminder VNM
card.text: Before the game starts, place your sanctum here face down. This is not an ordered deck. You can look at your sanctum at any time. Your sanctum consists of up to seven basic land cards and unique nonbasic cards that can start in the sanctum. You can move cards in and out of your sanctum in sideboarding, provided that all the cards in it can start there.

card.name: Pathbound VNM
card.text: Pathbound cards in your sanctum count towards deck building costs when creating a starting deck. Each pathbound card in your sanctum must be unique. You may have only five pathbound cards in your sanctum at the beginning of the game.

card.name: Vrep token WAW
